aboutapp.title: About App
aboutapp.title1: The Allure Spa app is the perfect solution for those who love beauty and want to explore high-quality spa products and services from Japan. Designed exclusively for Allure Spa customers, this app not only provides a convenient shopping experience but also helps customers easily access high-class beauty treatments.
aboutapp.title2: Basic information of Allure Spa application:

order.title: Order
content1: Customers can easily order cosmetics and book spa appointments directly through the Allure Spa app.
Once the order is successfully placed, customers will receive confirmation via email or notification on the app.
For cosmetic products, please carefully check the product information and quantity before confirming the order.
content2: Customers are required to provide accurate and complete information to ensure smooth delivery.
Allure Spa is not responsible for unsuccessful delivery if the order information is incorrect.

payment.title: Payment
methods: Allure Spa accepts various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and online payment options such as PayPal.
Payment must be completed before the order is processed and shipped.
All online transactions are secured via SSL payment gateways.
processing: Once the payment is completed, Allure Spa will confirm and process the order.
In case the payment fails, customers will receive a notification and detailed instructions on how to reattempt the payment.

shipping.title: Shipping
delivery_time: Cosmetic orders will be shipped within 3-5 working days from the order confirmation date.
Delivery time may vary depending on the shipping location and shipping conditions.
shipping_fee: Shipping fees will be calculated based on the delivery address and displayed at checkout.
Customers can check the shipping costs before confirming the order.
tracking: Once the order is shipped, customers will receive tracking information to follow the delivery process.
Customers can contact customer service if they encounter any issues during shipping.

conditions.title: Return Conditions
general_conditions: Allure Spa accepts returns within 14 days from the date of receiving the goods.
Products must be in original, unused condition, and the packaging should not be damaged.
Customers need to retain the receipt and relevant documents when returning the product.
To initiate the return process, please contact customer service at support@allurespa.com or call the hotline.
not_eligible: Used products or those with damaged packaging are not eligible for return.
Promotional or special discounted products cannot be returned, unless there is a manufacturing defect.

process.title: Return Process
steps: Customers should contact customer service to notify their intention to return the product and provide the order details and reason for the return.
steps2: After receiving instructions, customers should return the product to the address provided by Allure Spa.
Customers are responsible for the return shipping cost, except in cases where the product is defective or not as described.
steps3: After receiving the returned product, Allure Spa will inspect and verify the product condition.
If the product is eligible, Allure Spa will proceed with the exchange or refund as requested by the customer.

refund.title: Refund
process: After receiving and inspecting the returned product, Allure Spa will process the refund within 5-7 working days.
The refund will be credited to the original payment method used by the customer.
Customers will receive a notification via email once the refund is processed.
costs: Refund costs will include the full product value and any original shipping charges (if applicable).
In cases where the product is defective or not as ordered, Allure Spa will cover the return shipping and provide a full refund.

reschedule.title: Reschedule Spa Appointment
conditions: Customers can reschedule their spa appointment for free if they notify at least 24 hours prior to the original appointment time.
If the notification is made less than 24 hours in advance, Allure Spa will charge a cancellation fee of 50% of the booked service price.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
data_collection: Allure Spa is committed to protecting customers' personal information and using it solely for providing the best service.
Customers' personal information will not be shared with third parties unless required by law or necessary to complete the order.
payment_security: Allure Spa uses SSL-secured payment gateways to ensure the safety of online transactions.
Customers can trust the online payment methods available on our app.
